name: russian
description: Flash card app for learning Russian
author: David Brudnicki <davidbrudnicki@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules & rm -rf yarn.lock & rm -rf .cache & rm -rf dist && yarn
scripts.build: docker rmi -f dbrudnicki/russian && rm -rf build && parcel build public/index.html --out-dir build && docker build --no-cache -t dbrudnicki/russian .
